subject: Order cancellation
description_text:
Hi,

I’m looking to cancel on one of the items in my order. My order number is
#SSN1715. I bought a shifter and a hand brake and when I view my order
status it says my shifter has shipped out but not my hand brake. I’m
looking to be able to cancel the order for the hand brake and keep the
shifter as it’s already almost here.

Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi Reymond Ouellette,     Sorry, the parcel is almost delivered and we can no longer cancel it for you, here is the link to your logistics tracking:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXQ1361945166YQ
